title: Garmin DriveSmart: Calming the chaos of daily commuting
description: See what emerges when Bluetooth technology combines with the latest in dedicated GPS car navigation. This brief highlight video on the new Garmin DriveSmart gives an overview of the unit’s key features, including: hands-free calling, voice-activated navigation, smart notifications to display incoming calls, texts and other app alerts – plus helpful driver alerts to keep you aware of upcoming sharp curves, speed changes, and more.
